user_kicks.en: {user} has been kicked {kicks} times and has kicked people {kicked} times.
user_kicks.es: Se ha expulsado {user} {kicks} veces y {user} ha expulsado personas {kicked} veces.
user_kicks.na'vi: Tuteol {user}it tsrame'i {kicks} hìmtxan ulte sute tsrame'i {kicked} hìmtxan.
user_kicks.cy: Cafwyd {user} ei gicio {kicks} gwaith ac wedi cicio pobl {kicked} gwaith.
user_kicks.nl: {user} is {kicks} keer gekickt en heeft anderen {kicked} keer gekickt.
user_kicks.de: {user} wurde {kicks} mal gekickt und hat {kicked} mal andere Benutzer gekickt.

ckicked.en: Attention: {kicker} has kicked {kickee} from {channel}. The reason given was: "{reason}."
ckicked.cy: Sylw: {kicker} wedi cicio'r {kickee} o {channel}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."

cbanned.en: Attention: {banner} has banned {banee} from {channel}. The reason given was "{reason}."
cbanned.cy: Sylw: {banner} wedi gwahardd {banee} o {channel}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."

nbanned.en: Attention: {banner} has banned {banee} from the {network} network. The reason given was "{reason}."
nbanned.cy: Sylw: {banner} wedi gwahardd {banee} ledled y rhwydwaith. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
nbanned.de: Achtung: {banner} hat {banee} auf dem gesamten Netzwerk gebannt. Grund: "{reason}."

nbanned_notify.en: You have been banned from the {network} network by {banner}. The reason given was "{reason}." You can join {admin_channel} for more information or to discuss the ban.

nban_quote.en: {banee} was banned from the network by {banner} on {time}. The reason given was "{reason}."
nban_quote.cy: Cafodd {banee} ei wahardd o'r rhwydwaith gan {banner} ar {time}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
nban_quote.de: {banee} wurde von {banner} auf dem gesamten Netzwerk um {time} gebannt. Grund: "{reason}."

nunbanned.en: Attention: {unbanee} has been unbanned from the {network} network by {unbanner}.

nunban_notify.en: You have been unbanned from the {network} network by {unbanner}.

nunban_error.en: It appears {unbanee} was not banned using the ~nban command.

quote_recorded.cy: Mae hyn wedi cael ei gofnodi yn ~ban_{user}.
